overview:
Toke Kruse is an entrepreneur, author and mentor for Start-up companies.

He was born in 1982 in Copenhagen, Denmark, started my first company at the age of 18. Since 2000, he has launched different kind of online companies; some have been great successes, others have failed. Today he lives in San Francisco (USA).

Currently, his primary work is as CEO at Slideshop.com. In his “spare” time he serves as a board member or board chairman for five companies, do personal mentoring work, and author books.

degrees.subject: Information Technology and E-Business
degrees.institution: University of Copenhagen and IT University of Copenhagen
